front.title: CORECONF: Managing IoT Devices with YANG Models

abstract.t: This short paper provides an overview over the CORECONF architecture for employing YANG models in managing IoT devices. CORECONF is based on CoAP as a transfer protocol and YANG-CBOR as its data representation format, analogous to the way the original RESTCONF was defined to use HTTP and YANG-XML or YANG-JSON, and the way NETCONF uses SSH and YANG-XML.
